question:
[Gerald]'s mother [Judy] had to help him with his homework because he was having a test soon. [Janice] and her sister [Ethel] were arguing over a toy. While they were fighting, [Janice]'s sister [Michele] grabbed the toy, and ran off to play with it by herself. [Manuel]'s mother, [Michele], took him shopping for a new television [Freddie] waited at dinner for his sister, [Alice]. She was running late due to a phone call with her brother, [Gerald]. [Freddie] went to his brother [Lawrence]'s Birthday party [Kenneth]'s son, [Manuel], was mowing the lawn. [Kenneth]'s sister, [Judy], asked [Manuel] if he wanted some lemonade.
Question: How is [Ethel] related to [Lawrence]?
